definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: MBL's work is truly amazing, thank you for letting me be a part of it.
sentences.chinese: MBL的工作确实是惊人的，谢谢你让我成为一部分。

sentences.english: It's part of the job description. - …
Are new products and services being offered that were not a part of the old site?
sentences.chinese: 还是提供的新产品和服务不属于旧的网站的一部分？

sentences.english: Flow property testing should be part of routine pre-engineering work, he says.
sentences.chinese: 流动性是日常先期工程工作的一部分，他说。

sentences.english: The commercial is part of the government's new campaign against smoking.
sentences.chinese: 商业局是政府反对吸烟运动的一部分。

sentences.english: But within reason, flirting is part and parcel of our daily lives.
sentences.chinese: 但当然了，调情是我们日常生活中不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: The instantmessaging feature appears to be one part of Microsoft's response.
sentences.chinese: 即时通服务似乎是微软对此举动作出回应的一部分。

sentences.english: Last installment I mentioned some of the big - picture aspects of creating an exe packer.
sentences.chinese: 上一部分我提到了关于制作加壳程序主要方面。

sentences.english: But investment in global health is in the national interest too, " Varmus told The Times.
sentences.chinese: 而且投资全球卫生也是国家利益的一部分。

sentences.english: Quite a number of imprecise words are used in our everyday speech.
sentences.chinese: 我们的日常用语中有相当一部分是不确定词。

sentences.english: The axis of rotation and its support are part of the central pedestal.
sentences.chinese: 旋转轴和它的支撑结构是中央操作台的一部分。

sentences.english: Part of every crop is saved for seed.
sentences.chinese: 每一种庄稼都留一部分成作种子。

sentences.english: At last it puts forward the countermeasures to the development of tea industrialization in Ying Shan County.
sentences.chinese: 最后一部分重点探讨英山县茶叶产业化发展的对策。

sentences.english: But another part wonders what's next after sitting up straight.
sentences.chinese: 但另一部分又怀疑，坐端正之后又会发生什么呢？

sentences.english: You're exactly right, and that's part of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 你说的完全正确，这就是问题的一部分。

sentences.english: Thirty-odd years ago, in 1968, some of the stories collected here first appeared in book form.
sentences.chinese: 本书所收故事，一部分早在一九六八年就出了单行本。

definition: in large part/the greater part/the majority
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
